data.title: DRAGON BALL: POWER LEVEL CHALLENGE
data.statement:
In the world of Dragon Ball, characters compete in tournaments to showcase their strength.

Each character has a power level, and the goal of this challenge is to determine the winner of a tournament based on the power levels of the contestants.

data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read CharacterName:word(100) PowerLevel:int
write Kamehameha
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1>>: An integer [[N]] for the number of characters.
<<Next [[N]] lines>>: A string [[CharacterName]] and an integer [[PowerLevel]], separated by a space, for the name of the character and their power level respectively.
data.outputDescription: The names of characters with the highest power level in ascending order, one name per line.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

In the world of Dragon Ball, characters compete in tournaments to showcase their strength.

Each character has a power level, and the goal of this challenge is to determine the winner of a tournament based on the power levels of the contestants.
Input
Line 1: An integer N for the number of characters.
Next N lines: A string CharacterName and an integer PowerLevel, separated by a space, for the name of the character and their power level respectively.
Output
The names of characters with the highest power level in ascending order, one name per line.
Constraints
1 ≤ N ≤ 100
CharacterName does not contain space characters.
1 ≤ PowerLevel < 2³²
Example
Input
4
Goku 9001
Vegeta 8500
Krillin 3000
Piccolo 7000
Output
Goku
